MS MCQs

    Optimizing tightly coupled HPC applications on HBv2, HC, and HB series virtual machines - Select the right MPI library

    »

    1. Which MPI libraries will work on the HB120_v2, HB60, and HC44 VMs?

      Only Intel MPI, because Azure only supports the DAPL InfiniBand API

      Mellanox tuned HPCX MPI library

      All popular MPI libraries


    2. Which MPI library is recommended on HB120, HB60, and HC44?

      Intel MPI 2019 update5+

      HPCX MPI library

      Any MPI library on the CentOS-HPC 7.8+ Azure Marketplace image, because they all have the same performance


    3. Which MPI library is ABI compatible with mpich library?

      Intel MPI

      HPCX MPI library

      All MPI libraries are ABI compatible
